text: int main ( ) { long int k , t , i , j , * * a , * sum , n , total ; scanf ( "%ld" , & t ) ; a = ( int long * ) malloc ( 100 * sizeof ( long int ) ) ; while ( t -- ) { total = 0 ; scanf ( "%ld" , & n ) ; sum = ( long int * ) malloc ( n * sizeof ( long int ) ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { sum [ i ] = 0 ; a [ i ] = ( long int * ) malloc ( 1000 * sizeof ( int ) ) ; for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) scanf ( "%ld" , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) for ( j = 0 ; j < n ; j ++ ) { if ( j <= i ) k = 0 ; else k ++ ; sum [ i ] += a [ j ] [ k ] ; } total = sum [ 0 ] ; for ( i = 1 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { if ( total < sum [ i ] ) total = sum [ i ] ; } printf ( "%ld\n" , total ) ; free ( sum ) ; } return 0 ; }
